slides.subSlogan: Comprehensive import-export and distribution solutions, meeting the most stringent standards.
Your trusted partner accompanying Vietnamese businesses on their journey to global expansion.

children.text: With over 25 years of experience from our parent company network in France, USA and Thailand, VINHAPAC is a pioneer in multi-sector import-export and distribution. Our advantage lies in our deep understanding of international markets, professional operations, and a network of reputable manufacturing partners in Vietnam, committed to delivering sustainable value to customers.

sections.heading: Featured Products
sections.subheading: Explore our flagship product lines trusted by international markets.

products.name: Premium Agricultural Products
products.description: Cashews, coffee, and pepper meeting GlobalG.A.P standards, processed and packaged according to HACCP standards.

products.name: Export Garments
products.description: Knitwear and fashion garments from modern factories, fulfilling large-scale orders.

products.name: Wooden Furniture
products.description: Natural wood furniture with exquisite design, durability, suitable for various architectural styles.

features.title: International Certifications
features.description: Quality management system certified to ISO 9001, products meeting safety standards like HACCP, GlobalG.A.P.

features.title: Production Capacity
features.description: Collaboration with large factory networks, modern technology, ensuring progress and quality for all orders.

features.title: Expert Team
features.description: Experienced experts in logistics, customs procedures and markets, ready to consult 24/7.

features.title: Extensive Experience
features.description: Inheriting over 25 years of industry experience, successfully handling thousands of complex shipments.

posts.title: Logistics Industry Trends 2024 and Opportunities for Vietnamese Businesses
VINHAPAC achieves ISO 9001:2015 certification, affirming quality commitment

items.quote: VINHAPAC's professionalism and transparency have helped us save significant time and costs in sourcing. A very reliable partner.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.quote: The quality of garments from VINHAPAC always exceeds expectations. Their team is very technically knowledgeable and always supports us enthusiastically during production.
items.author: Sophie Dubois

Export Vietnamese products to USA, EU and Asia – fast, efficient, meeting international standards.

stats.yearsDescription: Experience and reputation in import-export field
stats.revenueDescription: Annual import revenue of the company

features.title: INTERNATIONAL PRESENCE
features.description: We are proud to bring Vietnamese Construction Materials and goods to establish and affirm their position in key international markets.

features.title: DEVELOPMENT CONNECTION
features.description: A solid bridge connecting Vietnamese manufacturers with foreign partners. Committed to promoting international cooperation and developing global trade activities.

features.title: STRATEGIC COOPERATION
features.description: Cooperating with major domestic and international brands, distributing diverse goods and services, comprehensively meeting domestic market demands.

features.title: PROFESSIONAL CREATIVITY
features.description: Flexible business strategy with professional, dynamic, creative staff experienced in international trade.

products.title: Agricultural Products
products.description: We export high-quality rice, robusta & arabica coffee, black pepper and cashews grown in Vietnam's most fertile regions.

products.title: Seafood
products.description: Frozen shrimp, pangasius fillet, squid and other seafood products meeting global HACCP and ISO standards.

products.title: Furniture
products.description: Eco-friendly wood and bamboo furniture, designed for durability, ready for export to US & EU markets.

products.title: Garments & Textiles
products.description: OEM/ODM garment production with high-quality fabrics, competitive prices and reliable delivery schedules.

products.title: Handicrafts
products.description: Handcrafted products from bamboo, rattan and lacquer created by skilled artisans for modern and traditional decorative needs.

products.title: Spices & Herbs
products.description: Vietnamese cinnamon, star anise, ginger, turmeric and medicinal herbs exported in bulk or packaged for retail.

services.title: Comprehensive Export Solutions
services.description: Comprehensive support from sourcing, logistics to international compliance handling.

services.title: Customs & Documentation
services.description: Fast, accurate customs clearance service and international export documentation.

services.title: Sourcing & Product Aggregation
services.description: Close relationships with local manufacturers in industries such as garments, food, furniture and many other sectors.

services.title: Quality Control & Certification
services.description: Strict quality inspection with international certification guarantee for every shipment.

services.title: Customized Distribution Network
services.description: Flexible and scalable delivery channels to match partner requirements worldwide.

services.title: Global Partnership Relations
services.description: Strategic cooperation with logistics and supply chain experts in France, USA and Asia.

certifications.name: HACCP
certifications.description: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points

callToActionSecondHeading.title: Ready to Get Started?
callToActionSecondHeading.description: Whether you're looking for product sourcing or want to export goods, we have the expertise to help you succeed.

buyer.title: For International Buyers
buyer.description: Access premium Vietnamese products with guaranteed quality, competitive prices, and reliable worldwide shipping.

supplier.title: For Suppliers
supplier.description: Join our trusted supplier network and expand your business to international markets with professional support.
